title: Test Memory - A Memory Testing Card Game
desc: A fun React.js-based memory game where players match pairs of cards. It features smooth animations, responsive design, and logic to prevent interacting with already matched cards. This project demonstrates my skills in React.js and interactive web development.

title: Quiz Game - A Simple Timed Quiz Game
desc: An engaging and interactive quiz game that challenges users with a variety of topics. Features timed questions, immediate feedback, score tracking, and a responsive design. Designed to test knowledge and provide educational fun in a user-friendly interface.

title: Fuel Calculator - A Fuel Cost Estimator
desc: A fuel cost calculator app that estimates fuel expenses based on distance, vehicle mileage, and fuel price. Simple, efficient, and easy-to-use, it helps users calculate the total fuel cost for their trips.

title: RideLync - A Simple Ridesharing Platform
desc: RideLync is a web-based ridesharing platform developed as a final-year project using React for the frontend, Django for the backend, and MySQL for database management. It offers features like posting a ride, searching available rides, user chat, ride ratings, and more, making commuting easier and more efficient.
